website_summaries.verdict: Unique throwback 90s design with the decade’s signature bulky details and a contemporary twist.
pros: Synthetic construction makes for a lightweight and durable sandal
Cushioned platform is an ideal height for walking across sand without getting too much trapped in the sandals
Adjustable straps for a fully customizable fit
cons: Not available in many colors, and design could be a bit overpowering or bold for some wearers

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute Summer Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Usual Adidas run big in shoes, these sandals are true to size. I absolutely love them. They are airy and comfortable. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Aleasha Maryam Gadi-Hamdan

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting & comfortable. Don't buy if your feet sweet a lot.
customer_reviews.text: They were initially painful to use for a long time because the arch was to high but I got used to them. The only think i didn't like about them is that they absorb your sweet and it's not a pretty smell. My feet don't sweet a lot therefore it was surprising to see how much these smelled after three uses.
customer_reviews.author: Malu

customer_reviews.title: If your an 8 1/2, order an 8!
customer_reviews.text: Way too big and too tight. I’m an 8 1/2, unfortunately there’s no option here to order an 8 1/2, so I went up to 9... I’m wishing I would’ve ordered an 8. These are too long and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Nyomi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sandals! Literally feels like I’m walking on clouds. They do run large, so I would suggest sizing down. At first, the straps had no stretch. After a few times wearing them, they adjust to your feet!
customer_reviews.author: Julliane Lopez

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: overall i really like the look of sandals however they are not for people is high foot rise, top strap is not adjustable (not the one with Velcro but one in the middle) and makes it very difficult fitting into the sandal. cant imagine i would wear these in cold weather but in heat and after walking around foot tend to expand making them very uncomfortable. I really like that they are light on foot but unfortunately design made for only certain type feet.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: WAY TO NARROW
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THESE SANDALS AS SOON AS I SAW THEM.... I actually got them in black and these white ones. I'm really upset that they didn't fit because everywhere I read it said they were "TRUE TO SIZE" but they arent. The material is very foamy and the straps are not stretchy they are pretty stiff, and are held on by velcro which I dont mind. But they should have AT LEAST used a stretchy band. Or given more strap in the back to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Yavi

customer_reviews.title: Probably better for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. The footbeds are comfortable and 99% of the time I love adidas.. I don’t know if it is the way a walk but by heel twisted and hung off the sides on the back. The straps are not stretchy so I didn’t think they would have adjusted over time so I decided to return them. They would probably be better on a narrower foot.
customer_reviews.author: Megs R.

customer_reviews.title: Nope never again,?c
customer_reviews.text: The quality was bad ....The sandals is pretty but not for people with flat feet it has no elasticity. I am a size 10 in women but i orderded an 11 to avoid it not fitting because of my wide feet....but results is that because it has no elastic whatsoever the size 11 turned out too long they hugged my feet fine but was extra long .....my feet didnt align with the sandals ......This is a purchase i regret
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Sandals
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I couldn't give it 5 stars is because it can be tight around the bridge of my feet .(the second strap from above). If it was not attached but rather had the ability to be loosened or tightened... it would've been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great hot weather walker
customer_reviews.text: Not the prettiest sandal but definitely the most sturdy and comfortable for a good walk, especially in our hot Florida weather. Very good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and fit of these sandals. They are very comfortable and light. I find them easy to clean but only with minimal dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kons

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. It's like a tennis shoe and sandal all in one. I have bad feet and these are very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals so much. I ordered the black and white pair first and loved them so much I decided I wanted them in white as well. They’re really comfortable and have good support. I work at a garden center where I’m on my feet and outside most of the day and these have been my go to shoes for work now. I’ve also gotten a ton of compliments on them cause they’re super cute. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte weed

customer_reviews.title: They straps are not elastic
customer_reviews.text: I thought the straps were elastic and they are not they did fit my foot because I have a wide foot
customer_reviews.author: barbara molina

customer_reviews.title: Top straps fits snug
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these sandals, they are not as comfortable as I expected. It isn’t soft or anything like memory foam. Sturdy and well designed, Overall I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. They go with everything. They’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: PepLuvStone

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: The sole was too thick and the sandals wasn't true to size. I usually wear size 8 and fits perfectly, but this size 8 and a lot of space in front.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Adidas sandal
customer_reviews.text: Sandal was very cute. Can wear with my shirts or sundress. Very comfortable Was out with my daughters walking and my feet didn’t hurt. Very nice sandal, just purchased the black.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. Matches a lot of outfits. Slightly on the big size but I think that’s just the adidas style
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very comfy. So glad I purchased these! Very well made also.
customer_reviews.author: SherriD

customer_reviews.title: I’m so thankful to find a pair of sandals that don’t hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. For me to say that is surprising because I have heel spurs and I have had a very hard time finding any shoe that I can wear that does not hurt my feet. I graded them a 3 on stretch. They don’t stretch, but the heel strap does adjust. It also has Velcro so it can be opened also.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Wood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kicks.
customer_reviews.text: Getting a pedi right now to wear for first time. Lived on the walk here
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette D.

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: They are light, but have great support. I have had both knees replaced, and need shoes that are comfortable, with good support They are like walking on clouds. They appear to be a little clunky. However, I wore them with a long skirt and the looked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Dang!
customer_reviews.text: Not for wide feet! I tried. More than once lol
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I have type 1 diabetes with severe neuropathy. These are so light and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Get them!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good!! Super comfy and I think they are adorable!
customer_reviews.author: najahass

customer_reviews.title: Problem feet
customer_reviews.text: They were not a good fit for my feet. I have a serious problem getting a fit
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I couldn't even fit through the strap because they don't lossen up. I'll recomend to go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: erin larrabee

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This shoes fits so perfect I'm in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need all colors!!! 😂
customer_reviews.text: I love these Adidas sandals 😍 they are very comfortable and the design is so cute
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Stay true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how comfy they were and I would definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Davila

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaayyyy toooo biigggg and chunky on my feet. Was not a cute look at all..
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Stick to your actual size in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I love the confort of this sandals super lightweight as well only problem i had was i think i got the wrong size everyone said to go down on your regular size which im usually 7.5 or 8 but i got 7 fits a little tight keep in mind my feet are skinny not too wide. Worth the money compared to actual stores is cheaper here
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Galarza

customer_reviews.title: I wrote to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I buy 6 Zise it too Small I need return because I can do use the sandal I love but too small
customer_reviews.author: Yolen Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for pregnant mommies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I was 7 months pregnant and they are the most comfortable shoes on my feet! I am currently 9 months pregnant and I still wear them because they are the only sandals my feet can handle! Plus they have a great style
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Casas

product_meta.title: adidas Women's 90s Regular Fit Swim Slide Sandals
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately 6-12 inches from arch
Boot opening measures approximately 0-3 inches around
